summary: A documentary focusing on the life of novelist and philosopher Ayn Rand, the author of the bestselling novels The Fountainhead and Atlas Shrugged and originator of the Objectivist philosophy.
cast: Sharon Gless|Michael S. Berliner|Harry Binswanger|Sylvia Bokor|Daniel E. Greene|Cynthia Peikoff|Leonard Peikoff|Al Ramrus|John Ridpath|Mike Wallace|Janne Peters|Peter Sands|Buzz Aldrin|Neil Armstrong|Cecil B. DeMille|Phil Donahue|Grand Duke Nicholas|Edith Head|Nadezhda Krupskaya|V.I. Lenin|Adolphe Menjou|Anastas Mikoyan|Marilyn Monroe|Frank O'Connor|Ayn Rand|Tom Snyder|Joseph Stalin|Robert Taylor|Leon Trotsky|Tsar Nicholas II|Kliment Voroshilov|Frank Lloyd Wright
title: Ayn Rand: A Sense of Life
